channel.title: The Long Shot Podcast
channel.description: The Long Shot features four comedians (Sean Conroy, Jamie Flam, Amber Kenny, and Joe Wagner) discussing their struggles through the general terrors of everyday life. There are also special guests, sketches, and original songs!

item.title: Episode #1017: The F**k Hole Episode featuring Brandie Posey
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Comedian (and Lyft driver) Brandie Posey joins Sean, Jamie, Amber, and Joe in the undisclosed location to talk about celebrity culture, Andy Dick, and chicken nuggets. Plus, hear Jamie get surprised by science. DIRECT DOWNLOAD Share on Facebook
item.content:encoded:
Comedian (and Lyft driver) Brandie Posey joins Sean, Jamie, Amber, and Joe in the undisclosed location to talk about celebrity culture, Andy Dick, and chicken nuggets. Plus, hear Jamie get surprised by science.

DIRECT DOWNLOAD

Share on Facebook

item.title: Episode #1016: The “Hot Room – Thank You” Episode
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The gang is back together and it’s time catch-up time. Sean has a new musical instrument. Joe has prospects. Amber’s getting additional imdb credits. And Jamie… “Hot room, thank you.” DIRECT DOWNLOAD Share on Facebook
item.content:encoded:
The gang is back together and it’s time catch-up time.  Sean has a new musical instrument.  Joe has prospects.  Amber’s getting additional imdb credits.  And Jamie… “Hot room, thank you.”

DIRECT DOWNLOAD

Share on Facebook

item.title: Episode #1015 The Larry Hoddleditter Episode featuring Jeff Wattenhoffer
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Amber’s boyfriend, comedian and cover letter artist Jeff Wattenhoffer is in the house, and things get heated. Sean is loopy, Amber is defensive, and audio engineer Jamie tells an amazing story about a chance encounter with some lady and a dude yelling at him from a car about some weird shit, or something. Joe, oh [...]
item.content:encoded:
Amber’s boyfriend, comedian and cover letter artist Jeff Wattenhoffer is in the house, and things get heated.  Sean is loopy, Amber is defensive, and audio engineer Jamie tells an amazing story about a chance encounter with some lady and a dude yelling at him from a car about some weird shit, or something.  Joe, oh he’ll be back soon.

DIRECT DOWNLOAD

Share on Facebook

item.title: Episode #1014: The Put That Coffee Down Episode
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Joe is sick and Jamie is stuck in a whirlwind, so it’s up to Sean and Amber to shoulder the load. it’s not easy, because Amber was in an accident, and for the first time in his life Sean has realized that to be the boss, you have to look like the boss. DIRECT DOWNLOAD [...]
item.content:encoded:
Joe is sick and Jamie is stuck in a whirlwind, so it’s up to Sean and Amber to shoulder the load. it’s not easy, because Amber was in an accident, and  for the first time in his life Sean has realized that to be the boss, you have to look like the boss.

DIRECT DOWNLOAD

Share on Facebook

item.title: Episode #1013: The Booming, Drunken, Peaking, Clipping, Joe’s First Mailbag Episode
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Amber, Joe, Jamie and Sean dig into their mailbag and find out that they shouldn’t read negative emails, that Jorge will eventually be in like 7 bands at once, and that if each of them were one of the characters in The Wizard of Oz, they would all be Dorothy. Then, a robot vacuum cleaner [...]
item.content:encoded:
Amber, Joe, Jamie and Sean dig into their mailbag and find out that they shouldn’t read negative emails, that Jorge will eventually be in like 7 bands at once, and that if each of them were one of the characters in The Wizard of Oz, they would all be Dorothy. Then, a robot vacuum cleaner kills itself.

DIRECT DOWNLOAD

Share on Facebook

item.title: Episode #1012: The 2015 Long Shot Thanksgiving Episode
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Sean and Amber celebrate Thanksgiving by bickering about whether or not “being thankful for something” is the same as “having something be your favorite.” Are you not thankful for things that are your favorite? DIRECT DOWNLOAD Share on Facebook
item.content:encoded:
Sean and Amber celebrate Thanksgiving by bickering about whether or not “being thankful for something” is the same as “having something be your favorite.” Are you not thankful for things that are your favorite?

DIRECT DOWNLOAD

Share on Facebook

item.title: Episode #1011: The Two Dots Episode featuring Dwayne Perkins
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: This is a podcast, and this is an episode of this podcast. This podcast is called The Long Shot. It features 4 people: Joe, Amber, Sean, and Jamie. Tonight, the aforementioned foursome is joined by Dwayne Perkins, who is not only a guest, but a special guest. This is a podcast. DIRECT DOWNLOAD Share on [...]
item.content:encoded:
This is a podcast, and this is an episode of this podcast.  This podcast is called The Long Shot.  It features 4 people: Joe, Amber, Sean, and Jamie.  Tonight, the aforementioned foursome is joined by Dwayne Perkins, who is not only a guest, but a special guest.  This is a podcast.

DIRECT DOWNLOAD

Share on Facebook

item.title: Episode #1010: The Sardine Talk Episode featuring Jane Becker
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Joe and Amber and also Sean and Jamie got together at an undisclosed location high in the Hollywood Hills to talk about stuff in the universe and they were joined by TV comedy writer and real human being Jane Becker who chimed in with her own thoughts on the universe, and it was just like [...]
item.content:encoded:
Joe and Amber and also Sean and Jamie got together at an undisclosed location high in the Hollywood Hills to talk about stuff in the universe and they were joined by TV comedy writer and real human being Jane Becker who chimed in with her own thoughts on the universe, and it was just like the best.

DIRECT DOWNLOAD
